short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Promised Neverland Yakusoku wallpaper change new tab to custom The Promised Neverland background. For Yakusoku anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle The Promised Neverland wallpapers every time you open a new tab.
2. Customize your The Promised Neverland background settings or select your favorite wallpaper in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media accounts for quick access.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down tasks and reminders.
7. Convenient access to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Option to add websites to the Shortcut panel for rapid access.
10. Direct access to Google applications.
11. Easy navigation to More Themes.
12. Streamlined sharing options for social media.
13. Quick download options for new wallpapers.
14. Fast access to gaming portals.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your The Promised Neverland new tab.
